name: Clockwork Abomination
description: The Clockwork Abomination is a large, humanoid construct with a powerful physique and an infernal power source. It features intricate mechanical components and an imposing presence.
memorable: Its ability to explode upon destruction makes it a dangerous foe, threatening nearby enemies.
goals: To serve its creator, engage in combat, and eliminate threats.
relations: May be associated with other constructs or mechanical beings.
environment: Typically found in industrial or arcane facilities where constructs are created or maintained.
strengths: High offensive capabilities with strong melee attacks and area control through fire breath.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical effects that can exploit its weaker dexterity save.
attacks: Multiattack includes a powerful Bite dealing piercing and fire damage, and a Slam that causes bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath allows it to unleash a damaging cone of flames affecting multiple targets.
senses: Has darkvision with a passive perception of 13.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and Stealth, demonstrating quite an agile nature despite being a construct.
additional_information: Does not need air, food, drink, or sleep.
Immune to being charmed, exhausted, or frightened.
Can't be transformed by spells due to Immutable Form.
Advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Easily traverses difficult terrain without penalty.
